skills.title: Languages & Frameworks
skills.description: I have hands-on experience with a variety of programming languages and frameworks including C, C++, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern libraries like React.js, along with Web3 integration for decentralized applications

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: My technical skill set includes expertise in Object-Oriented Programming (OOPs), working with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB, developing and integrating RESTful APIs, and building responsive interfaces using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.

skills.title: Tools
skills.description: I am proficient in using development and collaboration tools such as Git, GitHub, and Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel which help streamline my workflow and improve productivity in both individual and team environments.

skills.title: Professional Skills
skills.description: I bring strong teamwork, communication, and cooperation skills to every project, along with a high level of adaptability and a continuous drive for learning and growth in dynamic environments.
